description: This file defines a UI component named 'PropertiesPanel' using Lightning.js. It includes template markup, state management, hooks for initialization, methods for updating displayed properties based on selected elements, property adjustment functions, and input handlers for user interactions.

classes.name: PropertiesPanel
classes.description: A Lightning.js component that displays and allows editing properties of selected UI elements, such as text, button, image, or section.

methods.name: updateFromStore
methods.description: Updates the UI to reflect the properties of the currently selected element from the store.

methods.name: adjustSize
methods.description: Increases or decreases the size or dimensions of the selected element based on the delta value.
